title: Gavin Harper
text:
Gavin D. J. Harper (born 1986) is a technology author based in <a href="Machynlleth">Machynlleth</a>, <a href="Wales">Wales</a>.
Biography.
He left school aged 16 to work for a large engineering company before studying for <a href="A%20level">A level</a>s. Aged 16 he contacted the <a href="Open%20University">Open University</a> and enrolled on a degree course in technology and, at the same time, started writing his first book "50 Awesome Auto Projects for the Evil Genius". At the time, the <a href="Open%20University">Open University</a> believed he was the youngest person to hold a full Open University degree, (However, he has since been overtaken by 16 year old Cameron Thompson.) He later studied for a master's degree in sustainable architecture with the <a href="University%20of%20East%20London">University of East London</a>.
He read for his PhD at Cardiff University.
He is a member of the <a href="National%20Energy%20Foundation">National Energy Foundation</a>'s Advisory Council
Writing.
His works have been translated into Italian, Chinese and Korean.
